snippet: As Spain took steps to shore up its banking sector, the European Commission warned the government was likely to miss its deficit-reduction targets for this year and next.
abstract: European Commission warns that Spain is likely to miss its deficit-reduction targets for 2012 and 2013 by wide margins; announcement comes as the Spanish government takes further measures to shore up the country's banking sector.

byline.original: By JAMES KANTER AND RAPHAEL MINDER

lead_paragraph: As Spain took steps to shore up its banking sector, the European Commission warned the government was likely to miss its deficit-reduction targets for this year and next.

headline.print_headline: Europe Says Spain’s Deficit Will Probably Miss Target
